Class JkUtilsSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.utils.JkUtilsSystem

  • public final class JkUtilsSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to deal with the underlying ofSystem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean IS_WINDOWS
      Flag valuing true if the running underlying ofSystem is Windows.
